text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It's been a while since HishiAkebono scouted me as hertrainer. Today, we're spending a littletime together.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Yup, yup, these look juuust right! I bet<n>they're super—Ah,
but I shouldn't pick<n>too many from the same spot!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Let's run over to the next mountain to<n>forage some more!
Come on, Trainer!<n>Hurry, hurry! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A few days earlier...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Hey Trainer, are you free thisweekend? I want to make a hot potsumo wrestlers eat calledchanko, and I need ingredients.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I've always wanted to gather<n>ingredients together with my
trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
At most, I figured we would go to her<n>favorite fish and
vegetable stalls, but<n>that notion was quickly dashed when<n>
we headed into the mountains to<n>collect mushrooms.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Okay, that should do it. Next stop is<n>the sea!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Our basket is overflowing with<n>mushrooms after traversing
five<n>whole mountains. I try to lift it up, but...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! With all those mushrooms,<n>it's gonna be real heavy!
Just leave<n>that basket to me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Up we go! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She lifts the basket as if it were<n>nothing and slips her arms
into the<n>backpack straps. With the basket<n>securely resting
against her back, she<n>walks off with a smile.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: DRAAAUGH!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Look at the size of this sea bass!<n>Trainer, can you keep
watch over the<n>cooler? There's a lot of hungry kitty<n>cats
in the area.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Ah, I spy an even bigger fish!Come here!

text_block_list.name: Local A
text_block_list.text: Uh... Sorry, did that girl just catch afish with her bare hands?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Yahoo! Look at this huge fish!

text_block_list.name: Local B
text_block_list.text:
Oh come on, you must be seeing<n>thi—huh? Wait, you're
right... But, like,<n>literally how?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Catching people's attention<n>everywhere we go, we
continue to<n>gather ingredients. Seeing our haul<n>and feeling
my body aching, I start to<n>suggest we head back, when...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: All right, next stop is the butcher!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Yup! There's this butcher I like that<n>sells the most
scrumptious ground<n>chicken. We can't have our hot pot<n>
without that!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: It's a tad far from here, but theview on the way is totally worth it!Come on, let's gooo!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I watch her run off, her imposing<n>silhouette getting smaller
and smaller.<n>We've probably walked several<n>dozen
kilometers today, yet she<n>shows no signs of fatigue.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After over an hour on the train, we<n>finally arrive in a
deceptively peaceful<n>small rural town. If only I knew of the<n>
disaster to come!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Mmm! That country air smells so<n>good! W-wait, is that a
boar?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Oink! Oink!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Awww, it is! What a cute little piggy.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: ...Wait, why is it getting closer?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Stomp, stomp, stomp, stomp!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Eep! Wh-wh-whoa! Trainer, run<n>away!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Terrified, it takes me a few too many<n>seconds to react. As I
turn to run, I<n>lose my balance...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And fall into the nearby river, along<n>with our hard-earned hot
pot<n>ingredients.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Are you okay, Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thankfully, I'm not hurt, but all the<n>mushrooms and fish
Hishi Akebono<n>worked so hard to get are floating<n>away...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
No, I'm more worried about you than<n>some silly food.
Besides, we can just<n>buy extra meat instead! No worries! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: However, when we get to the<n>butcher...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Huh?! They're closed?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And then, as if to rub salt in our<n>wounds...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: We missed the last bus?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
It's so early! Did they change the<n>timetable? I swear there
was a<n>different one when we got off... I'm<n>sorry, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Let's see... the first bus arrives at six<n>o'clock in the
morning, so that<n>meeeans... we have twelve hours?!<n>For
real?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hoping to avoid camping out, I contact<n>the academy and try
to find us<n>accommodations, but to no avail...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: So we're camping, huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After all that work collecting<n>ingredients, we end up stuck in
the<n>countryside for the night... Hishi<n>Akebono may be
tough, but she must<n>be pretty shake—

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Oh well, these things happen! Ah, look<n>here! I've got some
canned food and<n>rice, so why don't I make us some<n>
mixed rice? ☆

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, it's not every day that we can<n>go camping. Might as
well enjoy<n>ourselves. ♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Wow! Look at the sky, Trainer! The<n>stars are so pretty!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her smile doesn't betray a hint of<n>fatigue or
disappointment. There's<n>even a bit of a skip in her step as
she<n>trots off.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
When I turn my eyes up, though, I<n>realize she was right—the
stars are<n>especially beautiful out here.
